SmartSpoon: A smartphone-integrated utensil for individuals with disabilities.
Smartphone-enabled Hearing Aids: A smartphone app that can control and adjust hearing aids.
Smartphone-based Brain Training: A smartphone app that provides cognitive training exercises.
Smartphone-integrated Exercise Bike: A smartphone-integrated exercise bike that provides real-time feedback and motivation.
Smartphone-based Virtual Wardrobe: A smartphone app that allows users to virtually try on clothes.
